events.gameview

Class GVEventGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • events.EventGenerator<GVEventListener>
      • events.gameview.GVEventGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGVEventGenerator, IEventGenerator<GVEventListener>

    public class GVEventGenerator
extends EventGenerator<GVEventListener>
implements IGVEventGenerator
    Event generator to fire gameView events.
    Author:
    Jasper S.
